name: Hack Em'
description:
A game where Hackers try to hack a server and the Administrator and IT's try to protect it.  Each team must work together to complete its objectives. Hackers must communicate to inject hacks. Administrators and ITs must communicate to repair the ports. The server is in your hands...

Hack Em' is in a very early stage of development. This release should not reflect the final product. The purpose of releasing so early is to get feedback. Please let me know what you think of the game in the comments OR email me at JackRandolph@JackedUpStudios.com. Thanks for playing!
